reviews.review_msg: make sure his notes make sense, he makes mistakes on the lecture notes couple times a week.....and tricky exams!
He is on e of the best prof.
Very clear prof. Easy to do well as long as you put in the effort. The textbook was not needed, his online notes and notes from class are more then enough.
good prof!!! very helpful if you need his help!!! go to his lectures!! fun and helpful!!! take his course if you see him!!!

Amazing voice I have to say and he makes calculus fun.He likes logics, ( same as PK ) so you'd better know what you are writing on exams. Overall, he is a fair prof and provides extra helps if you needed.

a helpful and responsible professor, this course covers so much stuff but it's not that hard actually. However, assignments and exams are very long, you have to spend a lot of time and effort to get a good grade

this prof is very helpful, very clear, exams are  fair, not very hard.  But this is not an easy course, i spent so much time on it.  You'll never understand everything in the course.  After all, he is good
Very very nice Prof.  Strongly recommend.  Always wearing tie @ class which is the only prof does that i've ever seen. :) very helpful

Justin is an amazing professor.  His notes are clear and understandable and include graphs to illustrate each topic.  His lecture style is great because he takes the time to explain each section of natural resource economics REALLY WELL.  Too bad this was a temporary teaching assignment and Justin is leaving SFU.  He's awesome.

worst instructor ever!! i have never seen a supply and demand curves like this. if you wanna learn something worry. pleas take the course. btw, all assignments need to be interesting and made up, this guy will make you works with high marks. if the works is boring which is true, you will get worst marks cuz it boring!!
This terrible prof i haven't ever meet before~!!!

he is the worst prof ever. Short lecture notes, hard exams and ever harder marking. His teaching skills are very bad and his lecture is very boring. Never ever take his class unless you want to lower your GPA
